action.name: Open terminal here
action.description: Open a terminal in the current directory

action.name: Open root window
action.description: Open this directory with a root instance

action.name: Optimize PNG image(s)
action.command: for file in %F; do oxipng --strip all "$file" && noctalia-shell ipc call toast send '{"title": "Image optimization", "body": "Image(s) optimized.", "icon": "picture"}'
action.description: Optimize the selected PNG image(s) with oxipng

action.name: Optimize JPEG image(s)
action.command: for file in %F; do jpegoptim -s -v "$file" && '{"title": "Image optimization", "body": "Image(s) optimized.", "icon": "picture"}'
action.description: Optimize the selected JPEG image(s) with jpegoptim
